messages.subject: Re: Homeschooling Documentary on radio
messages.msgSnippet: Helen is there a way for people who missed the broadcast to hear it online any way? I really wanted to hear your interview today but had a visitor from out of
messages.messageBody:
Helen is there a way for people who missed the broadcast to hear it online
any way?
I really wanted to hear your interview today but had a visitor from out of
town.
thanks
Beth

messages.subject: Re: Homeschooling Documentary on radio
messages.msgSnippet: Helen, Thanks.  I ve sent a query to OPB to see if they plan to air the show. John Andersen
messages.messageBody:
Helen,

Thanks. I've sent a query to OPB to see if they plan to air the show.

John Andersen

messages.subject: Homeschooling Documentary on radio
messages.msgSnippet: Hi homeschoolers, parents, friends... The documentary Inventing a Girl: An Experience in Homeschooling will be available for screenings starting in March. In
messages.messageBody:
Hi homeschoolers, parents, friends...

The documentary "Inventing a Girl: An Experience in Homeschooling" will be
available for screenings starting in March. In the meantime I was invited to a
radio show.
Please forward the following information and sorry for the late announcement,
I got the confirmation two minutes ago...

Thanks,

Fernanda
magafilms@...
www.inventingagirl.com
--------------------------------------------------
"Inventing a Girl: An Experience in Homeschooling"
a documentary by Fernanda Rossi

Filmmaker Fernanda Rossi will be interviewed by Jerry Mintz in "The Education
Revolution" broadcast live on "Talk America Network 1" (see below for details
on broadcast stations***)
SUNDAY JAN 30th at 11 am EST

(Maybe a bit early for folks on the West but perhaps you can listen to it
while brushing your teeth :-)

The audience can participate by calling 1 800 298-8255

Jerry Mintz is the founder of AERO
(Alternative Education Resource Organization).
Besides being the host of the program "The Education Revolution" he edits the
magazine of the same name.

----------------------------------------------
*** To hear the program please check the station and frequency and wether your
city is listed at the following address:
www.talkamerica.com/affiliat.html

If your city is NOT listed you can hear the program on the web:
Click the "Audio Feed One" button at www.talkamerica.com/audiofeed.html
OR
Click the "Yahoo Broadcast" button at
www.broadcast.com/radio/talk/talkamerica/

-Either way you'll need "Real Player Basic" which you can download for free
at:
www.realplayer.com or go directly to:
www.real.com/player/index.html?src=000126realhome_1,nav
The Basic version is hidden at the very bottom of the page.
The Plus version is more prominent on the page but costs $30.-!!

____________________________________________________________________
